game.name: Lucky Villager
game.shortDescription: 이 게임에서,당신은 당신이 원하는만큼 많은 돈을 벌 수 있습니다. 금을 수집 함정과 적대적 생물이 부와 숲에서 얻을 생존을 피할 수 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lucky villager - The luckiest villager goes hunting for gold! Take all the treasure from the evil leprechauns before they chop you into juicy bacon in this hardcore platformer!

reviewHighlights.text: The idea of the game is unusually interesting, the story is very exciting, the gameplay is incredible.
A simple game for fans of pixel pixelart.
